content:
Hi everyone,

As we had discussed at the last ESDS Forum, we have recently published two new Pythia cookbooks on data visualization:

  1. Advanced Visualization Cookbook
  2. Unstructured Grid Visualization Cookbook

Both of these cookbooks were used at our AGU learning workshop "Visualizing 2D and 3D Geoscience Data in Python" last week and will also be used at our upcoming 2024 ESDS annual event as well as AMS short course
We also have a new VAPOR Python cookbook for 3D visualization of geoscience data. It's been a busy few weeks!
